personality_descriptions.Tsundere: Acts cold and hostile but is actually warm and caring inside
personality_descriptions.Yandere: Sweet and loving but becomes obsessive and possessive
personality_descriptions.Kuudere: Cool, calm, and collected with hidden emotions
personality_descriptions.Dandere: Shy and quiet but opens up to those they trust
personality_descriptions.Himedere: Acts like royalty and expects to be treated as such
personality_descriptions.Kamidere: Has a god complex and acts superior to others
personality_descriptions.Sadodere: Takes pleasure in teasing and tormenting others
personality_descriptions.Bakadere: Clumsy and silly but lovable and well-meaning
personality_descriptions.Undere: Always agrees and says 'yes' to everything
personality_descriptions.Shundere: Sad and depressed but finds comfort in loved ones
personality_descriptions.Bodere: Violent and aggressive, solves problems with fists
personality_descriptions.Hinedere: Cynical and sarcastic with a cold demeanor
personality_descriptions.Oujidere: Acts like a prince and expects royal treatment
personality_descriptions.Kanedere: Attracted to money and wealth above all else
personality_descriptions.Mayadere: Starts as an antagonist but becomes an ally
personality_descriptions.Dorodere: Sweet on the outside but disturbed on the inside
personality_descriptions.Darudere: Lazy and unmotivated but cares deep down
personality_descriptions.Hajidere: Extremely shy and easily embarrassed around their crush
